Class UtcDateTimeConverter

Namespace
Cheetah.OpenSearch.Util

Cheetah.OpenSearch.dll

Converts DateTimes and DateTimeOffset to and from Unix epoch time (milliseconds)

public class UtcDateTimeConverter : DateTimeConverterBase
Inheritance
object
JsonConverter
DateTimeConverterBase
UtcDateTimeConverter
Inherited Members
DateTimeConverterBase.CanConvert(Type)
JsonConverter.CanRead
JsonConverter.CanWrite

Remarks

This converter is used to ensure that all DateTimes are serialized to Unix epoch time (milliseconds).
null values are (de)serialized as null.
